attributes.action: Make Eastbourne a decent place to live in again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eastbourne has over the past years been turned into a permanent building site.
Removal of grand houses to make way for ugly blocks of flats continues unabated.
Sovereign Harbour is a planners nightmare.
In short Eastbourne is no longer a desirable living area.
We wish Eastbourne returned to be a place good enough to live in again.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
